NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PLUME: Friends, I discovered a new quantum shard, while excavating one of the lower chambers of the tower today. Please do not be surprised if you it visits your chamber without warning! 2 1 THATCH: But of course: that must have been the source of the signal we heard coming from Giant's Deep, when we were studying the quantum shard on Brittle Hollow! 3 1 MELORAE: We should capture a photo of it to share with our friends back home. We've located yet another quantum shard! I wonder what lessons it may have to teach us. 4 3 COLEUS: Hm? How strange. Could everyone look away from the shard for a moment? It appears to no longer desire to travel for some reason! 5 4 MELORAE: Wait. The photo I took of the shard is still within my view. 6 5 MELORAE: Could.. Could observing the quantum shard, even through a photo, somehow be locking it in superposition? 7 6 COLEUS: Hypothesis confirmed! Hypothesis confirmed! Melorae, you've discovered a new quantum rule! My mentor and I are the greatest quantum geologists in the universe!
